query.groupByFieldsForStatistics: CASE WHEN Residency = 'Inside_City' and Employees_Type = 'Sworn' THEN 'Sworn - City Resident'  WHEN Residency = 'Inside_City' and Employees_Type = 'Civilian' THEN 'Civilian - City Resident' WHEN Residency = 'Outside_City' and Employees_Type = 'Sworn' THEN 'Sworn - Non Resident'  WHEN Residency = 'Outside_City' and Employees_Type = 'Civilian' THEN 'Civilian - Non Resident'  ELSE 'Non Resident' END
